review: Easy to use once I figured out how to navigate between the Amazon Prime homepage, and the Netflix, or Hulu home pages. If I used "Recently viewed" I could not get the search to work properly. But if I scrolled to "my Apps" then clicked, everything worked. At times the fire stick takes up to 30 sec. to load into the TV;  however, if I am patient it will appear. As with any new device, practice makes perfect.
author: Donna Martin
